org.kaaproject.kaa.server.common.dao.impl

Interface CredentialsDao<T extends Credentials>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - A specific security credentials type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<T,ByteBuffer>

    public interface CredentialsDao<T extends Credentials>
extends Dao<T,ByteBuffer>
    Author:
    Andrew Shvayka, Bohdan Khablenko
